title: Episode 32 - Chris Thile, Bert Kreischer, and Cooking on Sundays.
itunes:title: Episode 32 - Chris Thile, Bert Kreischer, and Cooking on Sundays.
description: Chris Thile is a Grammy award-winning musician, host of Live From Here, and a lover of great wine, food, and coffee. Bert Kreischer is a hilarious comedian who is working on the perfect salmon dish. And we talk about why it's important to cook on Sunday.
content:encoded: Chris Thile is a Grammy award-winning musician, host of Live From Here, and a lover of great wine, food, and coffee. Bert Kreischer is a hilarious comedian who is working on the perfect salmon dish. And we talk about why it's important to cook on Sunday.
